title: Enable basic user onboarding (no email)
constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor with all logic in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo if a state upgrade is required.

Do not edit frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*; compose these components/hooks instead.
Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not implement any email-based features (verification emails, email OTP login, SendGrid/Twilio integrations, email notifications).
nonGoals: Adding any email or SMS-based onboarding, verification, or notifications.
Introducing third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Implementing additional onboarding steps/content beyond what is necessary for basic first-time user guidance (unless explicitly requested).
